mapper.update: update member set grade=3 where email=#{restEmail}
mapper.delete: delete from restriction where rest_no in((select rest_no from restriction where end_date < to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')))
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as sort, rest.* from (select rest_no as restNo, rest_email as restEmail, rest_cg as restCg, rest_content as restContent, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, (select cg_name from category where cg_no = rest_cg) as cgName from restriction join category on(rest_no = cg_no) order by rest_no desc)rest) where sort between #{start} and #{end}

select rest_no as restNo, rest_email as restEmail, rest_cg as restCg, rest_content as restContent, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, cg_name as cgName from restriction r join category on (rest_cg = cg_no) where rest_email=#{email}
